div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 555 Dojran, Serbia, Yugoslavia, 1932 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: c. 100 AE Philip V: 1 Amphaxitis: 1 Amphipolis: 8 Pella: 13 Thessalonica: 10 Disposition: Zagreb 33 as listed Klemenc, Numismatika Zagreb 2-4 (1934-6), pp. 131,133
